source.description: Shadow evaluation slice exported from production telemetry for weekly gating.

sampling.notes: Stratified by locale and user_segment; excluded known test accounts and internal traffic.

pii_handling.notes: PII redaction applied prior to evaluation; scrub coverage tracked in separate audit logs.

labels.notes: Ground truth labels produced via rubric v2; inter-annotator agreement tracked separately.

slices.notes: Primary reporting slices used for fairness/consistency stratification.

extensions.notes: Example manifest for documentation and onboarding; replace fields with real provenance.
